text:
It would be useful to have a switch that globally disables all the timers in the
script. In this way a single script can be used to warm-up the server (with no
thinking times) and then to run the real load test (with thinking times)
creator: quasar7@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
See the duplicate bug for some work-rounds

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16052 ***
